[Information]

A highly efficient and stylish accessory to cove under-cabinet, display, and other accent lighting applications including signage, interior/exterior lighting, back lighting, accent lighting, landscape lighting, club lighting, bar lighting, architectural lighting and so many other DIY lighting projects. Our LED tape strip is flexible, subtle and long-life. Our assorted color LED strip is versatile and performs amazing functions of flashing, strobing, fading and smoothing with stunning hues of red, yellow, blue, green, and white. These luminous LED ribbon tapes come with strong 5M adhesive sticky backing that helps in easy mounting on most surfaces. These LED Strips are UL listed in numerous categories for all domestic and commercial applications. Create whimsical indoor or outdoor party ambiance with our Lustrous Luminaries LED Tape Strips. 

Additional Information:

  • Item is sold as an LED Strip Extension only
  • Power Supply Adapter not included
  • Up to 2xLED Strips can be connected(max.)
  • The LED Strip connected by wire will not be as bright as the LED Strip connected by adapter as it is not getting direct electricity supplied by adapter
  • Instruction Video Included (Click on the Youtube logo in Photo Gallery)
  • Recommended Power Supply Adapter--get specs based on Attached Pic in Photo Gallery
  • Attached below is a picture of the Step-By-Step Instructions on this Item

Features:

  • Low power consumption, Super-bright but running with low temperature
  • All the light spread and completely smooth, luminous very even 
  • Every 3-LEDS cuttable without damaging the rest strips, according to your requirement
  • Self-Adhesive back with Adhesive tape for secure and easy application
  • LED Type: High Quality 5050 SMD LED, high intensity and reliability, Long lifespan >50,000 hours 

Note:

  • Even the strip light is of IP65 waterproof design, only the surface is cover with waterproof PU material, in case of electric shock and degummed, please do not soak it in the water.

Light up dull and lackluster spaces with our exciting range of LED lights, string LED lights, and Fairy Led String Lights, that are not only a cost-effective and eco-friendly lighting option, but also add oodles of glitz and glam to any ambiance. These drop down Fairy Led String Lights are a perfect decoration for your home, office, or party space. Cast a magic spell upon your guests by placing these shimmering LED lights on your trees, around centerpieces, hedges, mantels, and other items of attention. The mystic effects of Waves, Slo Glow, Chasing/Flash, Twinkle/Flash, Slow Fade, Steady On, and Sequential will further leave your guests simply bewitched by such a spectacular sight to behold! Clear wire coating of these Fairy Led String Lights give an ethereal look and effect to whatever you adorn with them. With seven light effects, these fanciful lights will transform your simple spaces into reveling realms of radiance!

Add warm luminous accents to your backyard garden party, dance function, or wedding reception with our clear globe string lights. Featuring classic globe shape and crystal clear construction, these glowing balls of glory make a perfect lighting option for your Christmas Tree Decoration, Outdoor or Indoor Christmas Decoration, Backdrop Décor, Table Décor, and also for glamming up your patios, decks, pergolas, umbrella , bedrooms, office spaces, and every other place that needs a dash of dazzling drama! Unlike other lights available in the market, our bulbs are not glued to the plastic, thus are replaceable/ interchangeable. Exuding warm white LED lights, this fairy light sets comes with battery operated and remote control function with additional 8 modes option. This means, you can take the lights anywhere, hang from or drape to any place, and can have your mood rule the lightning modes! Being waterproof and cool to touch, the lights are environment friendly and safe to be used outdoors as well as in parties involving the youngest squad!
